ygData.subject: Re: Words, Runes, Pages
ygData.msgSnippet: Also in East Karana I have found Words and Runes, (and some grimore) on Scythe Beetles. FYI Draeker
ygData.messageBody:
Also in East Karana I have found Words and Runes, (and some grimore) on
Scythe Beetles.

FYI

Draeker

>From: Magis <Magis@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
>To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Words, Runes, Pages
>Date: Thu, 27 May 1999 23:56:22 -0230
>
>From: Magis <Magis@...>
>
> > On the subject of words. I seem to find more words than anything else.
> > This is good for me since I am a Necromancer. I have found most of them
>on
> > DW crocs and DW Caimans in Oasis. I have also found words and Runes on
> > Lavacrawlers in Lavastorm. There is no certain place where they are
>found,
> > I think all upper level monsters drop them from time to time. I have a
> > Druid friend who has found words, runes, and grimoire pages on Griffawns
>and
> > Griffennes in the Karanas. I think I covered everything I wanted to.
>If
> > there are any high level monks that know the basics of Dragon on
> > Bristlebain, or anyone else who knows it, give me a tell in-game if you
>do
> > not mind spamming me for a couple minutes to teach me the basice. I
>will
> > gladly trade knowledge of my languages with you.
> >
